name: iTuffy
0:
”Alexa open i Tuffy”
”where is the library?”
”how do i apply here?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: i. tuffy
des:
iTuffy is California State University, Fullerton’s Alexa skill allowing you to ask questions about the campus and is your 24/7 resource for campus information. Ask questions about upcoming events, search the campus directory, find operating hours for campus offices and services, dates and deadlines, eligibility or instructions to apply, refund information and many more. Some of the many questions iTuffy can answer: How do I drop a class?, How do I contact Financial Aid?, Where can I get advising?, Are there scholarships available?, Where can I pay fees?, When is the next holiday?, Who is the president?, What can I ask you?, Who is the mascot?

Ask Alexa to launch iTuffy and get your questions answered about CSU Fullerton! You can use this as a current or future student, parent, or guardian and on your own Alexa devices.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
